name: My life as a cat lady
name_original: My life as a cat lady
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 40 Compo.

You are a humble cat lady, who loves her little cat herd.

Keep the house tidy!

How to play:
Click around to move the gramma and use/swap tools.
You can only hold one item at the time.
To replish stamina, drink coffee.
Be mindfull of red chaos meter, game ends when it reaches 100%!
